title: offensive emails
content: Is there any way to block emails of naked women?
creator: BroJoeH

title: Thunderbird 115 "not responding" multiple times, daily on Windows 8.1 Pro - July, 2024
content: Hi, I'm using Thunderbird 115.4.1 and Windows 8.1 Pro. Ever since the Supernova update, TB crashes pretty much daily (up to 3x a day). I turned off auto-updates as soon as I found out how to, since everything was so confusing and didn't work the way I was used to. Now I'm afraid to do any more updates since I don't want a whole bunch of other things to get screwed up. I have learned to kind of work around the problem areas, though it's frustrating. But I don't want to spend another 10-15 hours trying to fix new problems. Any suggestions? I can't seem to find any information about people who have had this crashing problem and then had it resolved through an update. Thanks
creator: DD46

title: Not receiving or able to send emails
content: I have iinet.net.au as my email server. They changed to themessagingco.com.au. Initially there were no problems and I could receive messages and send then after June 3 I could do neither. I contacted iinet and themessagingco. for assistance. I spent heaps of time with themessagingco changing settings for incoming and out going mail but am still unable to send or receive on Thunderbird. Help required, as I want to continue using Thunderbird. I am able to receive and send through webmail for themessagingco but really want to use Thunderbird. Is there something on Thunderbird that needs changing? Helen
creator: helenl51

title: Deleting a question
content:
After posting a question here, I found the answer in one of your Help postings. So I deleted the question in this post (and changed the Subject), but was there a way I could have deleted the post itself?

Thanks for your help. Alan
creator: aheubert1

title: getting emails
content: I've been using Thunderbird to access email services from Protonmail, after using Proton's Bridge programme to link Thunderbird to my Protonmail a/c. After shutting down my computer one day I can no longer get emails. I can send them without any problem but not get them. Help please. Thanks, Charles
creator: cdrace

title: attention, security gap
content: After setting the master password, you can view emails, just cancel the password entry window! You can't send emails, but you can read them.
creator: compus

title: narrower and narrower in old email
content:
Hi,

Let's say you're opening an email in thunderbird, and it's an email you've been exchanging with someone for a long time. As you scroll down, the older emails are indented to the right, making the view of the email "narrower and narrower". What is the setting or method to prevent this from happening?

Thanks in advance!
creator: biz.kitaek.lee

title: Ciao, da pochi minuti nella posta in arrivo, come mittente/corrispondente mi appare sempre il solito mittente indipendentemente da chi mi scrive
content: Ciao, da pochi minuti nella posta in arrivo, come mittente/corrispondente mi appare sempre il solito mittente indipendentemente da chi mi scrive. Come faccio a far riapparire il mittente reale?
creator: castaldia

title: Archiving whole inbox & subfolders.
content: I have an email address that I used for my business but I've closed the business and want to use the address for personal use. Can I archive the whole of the inbox & subfolders so that I can access them if needed and start again with an empty inbox? If so where can I find step by step instructions to achieve this?
creator: Cashie_

title: Cartella "Posta in arrivo"  duplicata sotto altre cartelle, e impossibilità a rimuoverle.
content: Salve, mi trovo in Thunderbird, sotto altre cartelle da me generate, dei duplicati di cartelle "Posta in Arrivo" che non si riescono ad eliminare o a spostare. Come posso risolvere questo problema ? Grazie
creator: mbruselles

title: Mail folders not recognised
content:
I have linked Thunderbird to my iCloud mail using Apple's straightforward app-specific password facility. Thunderbird recognises the basic folders (inbox etc...) and I can send / receive mails.

Thunderbird does not recognise the majority of iCloud's Mail Folder hierarchy so most of my mail 'history' going back 20 years is missing. It is still present if I view it on iCloud's web service.

Two random folders (each containing 30+ mails) are available through the Thunderbird client. The remaining 70-80 folders are not.

This is a very simple Thunderbird set up, single e-mail account, no messaging or anything else (no need, don't want).

HP laptop, Windows 11, Intel i5 - plenty of RAM and local storage
creator: MartynSP2

title: Windows Key and version 115.12.2
content: I am running Thunderbird version 115.12.2. Since installing this version, the Windows key does not work when Thunderbird is running. If I exit Thunderbird, the windows key works again.
creator: ponting.john

title: Change 0% Completed Tasks Color
content:
My 0% Completes Tasks have red text in the Today Pane and red text and red background in task list. How can I change the color?

James
creator: JamesJ

title: Tbird 115.12.2 Calendar Print | List Mode Errors
content:
On the calendar, on the screen I have Week View At the top are "all day" events, following by events in chronological order. Everything looks fine.

Printing and print preview are radically different from screen. In one case the print started with appointments after noon and all-day events were listed below. Morning appointments were not listed at all. In another with no all-day events all the appointments were listed twice.

"Print Preview" is before printer selection so I suspect the problem is not the printer. I tried changing the printer and it made no difference.

Here is the TroubleShooting information

I appreciate your help.

Jonathan

title: 2GB Limit on Thunderbird (Imap) but 10GB limit at ISP
content:
Hello

I am using Thunderbird as a local client connecting to the mail server at my ISP using IMAP. The ISP has a 10GB storage limit. I have three active mailboxes and they are all well within my ISP's limits.

On one of my mailboxes, Thunderbird is showing that I have used 1.9GB of a 2.0GB total. I cannot see where this limit is set in Thunderbird - the ISP have confirmed it is not imposed by them.

I have gone through all the Thunderbird settings I can find, and cannot see where this limit is imposed. Any help finding it will be very gratefully received.

Thank you in advance.

Ben
creator: benedicta.makin

title: Problem with outgoing server SMTP ; cannot send emails
content:
Hi, our company is using a program called Visma Administration 1000 as economy system. Since we have macbook computers we thus have a Microsoft Remote Desktop downloaded, since the economy system only works through Windows! Anyhow, we then use Thunderbird as a local e-mail which is connected to the economy system, and through which we can send our orders, invoices etc to our email. However, ever since a few weeks back a troubleshooting messege has occured making us unable to send the emails; referring to a problem with the outgoing SMTP server. However, after speaking with an IT Support guy who looked it thorugh he said that everything looked like it should. BUT I am wondering if it might have anything to do with the server/thunderbird being blocked by the program, which I don't know how to check... Does anyone know how to fix it?

The error message is in swedish but translates to: "The message could not be sent. The message could not be sent because the connection to the outgoing server (smtp01.binero.se) failed. The server may be unavailable or is denying connection to the outgoing server (SMTP). Please check that your outgoing server (SMTP) settings are correct and try again."

I really appreciate any help I can get!! Thank you in advance, kind regards Ella

title: Microsoft "outlook.com" email accounts security?
content:
I have received an email from Microsoft on five out of seven of my outlook.com accounts which informs me :-

The safety and security of your information is top priority for Microsoft. To help keep your account secure, Microsoft will no longer support the use of third-party email and calendar apps which ask you to sign in with only your Microsoft Account username and password. To keep you safe you will need to use a mail or calendar app which supports Microsoft’s modern authentication methods. If you do not act, your third-party email apps will no longer be able to access your Outlook.com, Hotmail or Live.com email address on September 16th.

Is this correct or a scam. If correct, will Thunderbird be OK?

Cheers, Graham Davies. 9th July 2024.
creator: graham90

title: messaggio di errore
content:
Ho sbagliato a scrivere un indirizzo e-mail e ora, continuamente mi arriva il seguente messaggio: "Invio del messaggio non riuscito. Si è verificato un errore durante l’invio della posta. Il server di posta ha risposto: No such recipient here. 

Controllare il destinatario del messaggio “riccardopardi@eilsrl.it” e riprovare."

Questo messaggio non lo trovo più ne in posta uscita, eliminata e inviata. Come posso fare per non far arrivare più questo messaggio? Ho anche spento e riacceso ma ritorna nuovamente.

title: Two microsoft single-sign-on enabled gmail accounts at the same time.
content:
I have two different university accounts (one as a student and one as an adjunct). These accounts have the university domain, but they are through Gmail. Last year the university also instituted Microsoft single-sign-on for all emails.

Single-sign-on has the well-known, apparently unsolved, and extremely annoying problem that it makes it impossible to be signed into multiple single-sign-on accounts on the same browser at the same time. The solution to this problem so far is to use a private tab, or the Firefox "multiple containers" add-on, and separate one of the accounts into it's own container.

Thunderbird seems to have the same problem. I cannot connect to both accounts at the same time. The second one will not even open the popup to give credentials, and will always claim invalid authentication.

Is there some workaround similar to the Firefox browser workaround mentioned above?
creator: jheraldiv

title: Profile transfer to new computer (intel Mac>Apple Silicon M3 Mac) failed.

I tried the copy Thunderbird folder from old machine's profiles and paste on new machine in same location, but that didn't work. What now?? Thanks.
